mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vmb.mods(username, password, type, boards) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{type, typeHandler=com.github.vimboard.mapper.GroupTypeHandler}, #{boards, typeHandler=com.github.vimboard.mapper.ModBoardsTypeHandler})
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, type, boards FROM vmb.mods WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, username, password, type, boards FROM vmb.mods WHERE username = #{username} /* LIMIT 1 */
SELECT id, username, password, type, boards FROM vmb.mods

SELECT id, username, password, type, boards, (SELECT time FROM vmb.modlogs WHERE mod = id ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) AS last, (SELECT text FROM vmb.modlogs WHERE mod = id ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) AS action FROM vmb.mods ORDER BY type DESC, id
